threadCreated: Hi there! I have created this support thread for you. While awaiting a response, please be sure to review the Overseerr support guide and share any relevant logs/details: https://docs.overseerr.dev/support/need-help
threadResolveHint: If you created this thread by mistake or if you feel your issue is reolved please close this thread by typing **/resolve**
threadResolved: Marking this support thread as resolved. Any further messages in this thread will re-open the support thread. If you have a new question, please open a new thread!
errorNotThread: You can only use this command inside of a support thread.
errorNoPermission: You do not have permission to perform this action. Is this your support thread?
